nhc_headline: ...DISTURBANCE FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN SIGNIFICANTLY DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR THE LOWER FLORIDA KEYS AND DRY TORTUGAS...
summary:
...DISTURBANCE FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN SIGNIFICANTLY DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR THE LOWER FLORIDA KEYS AND DRY TORTUGAS...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 23
 the center of Nine was located near 18.1, -82.2
 with movement NNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
